label: Behavior 98791925
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: 'navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 56.7014 - 0.0011 × t, lon(t) ≈ 7.8402 - 0.0004 × t, where t is a normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)'
